text: Sengkang MRT/LRT Station is a railway station in Sengkang, north-east Singapore. It is an interchange station between the North East MRT Line and Sengkang LRT Line. The station is integrated with Compass One. ==Timeline== *18 January 2003: Station opened along Sengkang LRT Line East Loop *20 June 2003: North East Line opened *29 January 2005: Sengkang LRT Line West Loop opened in 1 direction *1 January 2013: Sengkang LRT Line West Loop became full-day 2-directional Category:Light Rail Transit (Singapore) stations Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations Category:Sengkang
title: Sengkang MRT/LRT station
